caption:
You could sound the #Canes warning siren tomorrow for Fan Appreciation Week! Go back and tag any pictures from games this season with #CaniacNation, or post new pictures with that hashtag, and you could be selected. Winner will receive four tickets for the game at 1 p.m. and sound the siren as the team takes the ice.
